thread.title: JP Gravitt

author: JP Gravitt
title: JP Gravitt
text: I needed this bond to become a notary public, so I went to this site and I was super surprised at how easy and simple it was to get a surety bond! I just took it to the Records office at the Probate Judge's office, they notarized it, signed it, and boom. I became a notary haha. This company was by far the most affordable I found, including my errors & omissions insurance for $10k, and I'm really looking forward to buying from them again in 4 years ^_^
